column1: Smoque BBQ////When it comes to sliced Brisket
column4: Baby Back Ribs and Pulled Pork
column5: this is where you want to go get some.  The best way to experience this great taste sensation is to call ahead for takeout.  Seating is limited and too close
column6: when you add patrons who are coming to pickup their takeout it gets even tighter.
